movie.title: Just One More Kiss
movie.description_intro: Ever longed for time with someone you lost? For Max and Abby, 'til death do us part' wasn't enough time in this ghost-love-story drama, the directorial debut by writer and critically acclaimed actress, Faleena Hopkins. You'll find the beginning starts out light and fluffy and then.
movie.description_full: Ever longed for time with someone you lost? For Max and Abby, 'til death do us part' wasn't enough time in this ghost-love-story drama, the directorial debut by writer and critically acclaimed actress, Faleena Hopkins. You'll find the beginning starts out light and fluffy and then.

movies.title: Black Jack
movies.summary: A rediscovered classic from director Ken Loach (THE WIND THAT SHAKES THE BARLEY, KES) and one of the inspirations for Wes Anderson's MOONRISE KINGDOM, BLACK JACK is a dark and complex adventure film set in the 18th century and based on Leon Garfield's novel for children. When French thief "Black Jack" kidnaps young Tolly, a journey begins that includes traveling fairs, murder and the rescue of a young girl from a private insane asylum. While shot primarily in 16mm and on a modest budget on location in Yorkshire, Chris Menges' photography, the enchanting performances by its young cast and Loach's gentle, observational style all shine through.

movies.title: Intersection
movies.summary: When a conman discovers his son is abducted, he is forced to drive the streets of Sydney completing an escalating series of trials to appease the kidnapper, and atone for his career of deception.
movies.description_full: When a conman discovers his son is abducted, he is forced to drive the streets of Sydney completing an escalating series of trials to appease the kidnapper, and atone for his career of deception.

movies.title: Love the Coopers
movies.summary: When four generations of the Cooper clan come together for their annual Christmas Eve celebration, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down, leading them all toward a surprising rediscovery of family bonds and the spirit of the holiday.
movies.description_full: When four generations of the Cooper clan come together for their annual Christmas Eve celebration, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down, leading them all toward a surprising rediscovery of family bonds and the spirit of the holiday.

movies.title: The Scorpion King: Book of Souls
movies.title_english: The Scorpion King: Book of Souls
movies.title_long: The Scorpion King: Book of Souls (2018)
movies.summary: In ancient Egypt, the mighty warlord, Nebserek, steals the fabled Fang of Anubis--a cursed sword imbued with the power of hell and the strength of its countless victims--intent on creating his evil empire. As the ruthless monarch burns down to the ground a small village, the wounded Akkadian mercenary, Mathayus, joins forces with the Nubian princess, Tala, to embark on a long and dangerous quest to find the mystical Book of Souls: the only thing that can put an end to Nebserek's tyranny. Will the legendary Scorpion King bring hope and restore peace?
